title: Getting EXTREME ping spike issues. Seems to be only on league, no other games.
body: So for the past two weeks or so my ping will shoot up to around 300-500 ping every 2 minutes or so. As you probably can tell, that is completely unplayable. I have tried resetting my router multiple times, I have reset the ethernet, reconnected to wifi. Is there anything else that can help me fix this issue? Thanks.

replies.body:
Inconsistencies in latency (ping) are typically caused by either an issue along your network routing or an issue with your local network settings. As your next step, I recommend working through the solutions listed in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure this isn't caused by problematic network settings on your local end.

Let me know if this helped.

I had this issue as well for quite awhile, Only to find out it was the most simplest thing that was making it happen. 
I had a whole lot of programs running in my background, (Which I didn't know about.)
I'd recommend going into Task Manager and ending some programs you aren't using seeing how they can potentially slow you down, and make you lag.
Also, If you do this don't forget to click on the "More Details" button so you can see everything that's running.
